post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Software Engineer -Java Developer
About the Job
Our Toronto based client is searching for a Software Engineer, as a member of the Development Team, will be responsible for building and customizing the Enterprise Platform for large-scale client deployments.
Responsibilities:
o Deliver high quality software with an emphasis on standards compliance and use of industry best practices
o Work as part of an integrated team with aggressive deadlines and client deliverables
o Adhere to quality and documentation standards
Qualifications:
o Degree in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent work experience
o Minimum 5 years of direct work experience as an enterprise Java developer
o Experience with SDLC, Spring, Hibernate, JavaScript, SQL and unit testing is required
o Experience with ExtJS, JBPM, Crystal Reports, Drools, Maven, Oracle, SQL Server, Websphere, Weblogic, ASP.NET, Unix, and REST/Jersey is an asset
o Previous experience with risk management software is an asset
o Ability to communicate well within an established team
o Ability to work on multiple projects
o Fast-learner
post.title: Java Developer - Agent
